description: This file defines a React component library for managing focus in TV applications, specifically for Android TV remotes. It includes context providers, hooks, and components to handle focus registration, focus movement via arrow keys, and focus management for focusable elements.

methods.name: useFocusableRegistry
methods.description: Hook to manage registration and retrieval of focusable elements.

methods.name: FocusManagerProvider
methods.description: React component that provides focus management context, handles focus movement and key events.

methods.name: useFocusManager
methods.description: Hook to access focus management context.

methods.name: Focusable
methods.description: Component that makes its child focusable and registers it with the focus manager.
